name: Veb Local SEO Schema Markup
author: Veblogy Innovative Technology Pvt. Ltd.

sections.description:
This plugin takes input from Site Owner and add Local Schema to pages for better SERP results.

Short Description

The Plugin is made to easily add Local Schema tag for Local SEO benefits to Post and pages.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 (or later). See the GPL License for more details.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Local SEO Schema Markup directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Local SEO schema Menu and setup all the fields.
  4. Click the “Save” button and add the Local Schema Tag to post and pages.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin takes input from Site Owner and add Local Schema to pages for better SERP results.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Added GPLv2 license declaration.
  • Enhanced security and compliance with WordPress coding standards.
  • Improved user interface for displaying results with green ticks and red crosses.
